statements: SELECT * FROM historical_inventory_data;
SELECT product_name, product_category, quantity FROM historical_inventory_data;
SELECT id, cost, revenue FROM historical_inventory_data WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM historical_inventory_data WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT product_name, cost, revenue FROM historical_inventory_data ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_inventory_data WHERE product_name = 'Product A';
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM historical_inventory_data WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_category, revenue FROM historical_inventory_data WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01' AND purchase_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY revenue DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_category, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM historical_inventory_data GROUP BY product_category HAVING total_products > 50 ORDER BY total_products DESC;
SELECT SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue, AVG(cost) AS average_cost FROM historical_inventory_data WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM inventory_data WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory_data ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory_data WHERE quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT product_name, date_added FROM inventory_data WHERE product_id = 100;
SELECT transaction_id, quantity_sold, total_price FROM sales_data ORDER BY sales_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_data WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory_data GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT product_name, quantity, date_added FROM inventory_data WHERE quantity < 5 AND date_added > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sales_date, SUM(total_price) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY sales_date HAVING total_sales > 1000;
SELECT * FROM inventory_data AS inv JOIN sales_data AS sales ON inv.product_id = sales.product_id WHERE inv.quantity > sales.quantity_sold;
SELECT * FROM historical_inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM historical_inventory WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM stock_trends ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM stock_patterns WHERE pattern_id = 1;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM historical_inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC, purchase_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, purchase_date FROM historical_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM stock_patterns WHERE pattern_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM historical_inventory WHERE purchase_date >= '2021-01-01' AND purchase_date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT trend_description, trend_date FROM stock_trends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM historical_inventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%' OR product_name LIKE '%banana%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_inventory_data WHERE item_id = 100;
SELECT date, quantity FROM historical_inventory_data WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT DISTINCT item_id FROM historical_inventory_data;
SELECT trend_id, pattern_id FROM trends_and_patterns WHERE trend_id < 5 ORDER BY pattern_id DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, pattern_id FROM inventory_analysis WHERE analysis_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM historical_inventory_data WHERE date > '2022-01-01' AND quantity > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT item_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM historical_inventory_data GROUP BY item_id HAVING total_quantity > 500;
SELECT trend_id, pattern_id, description FROM trends_and_patterns WHERE trend_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY pattern_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM overstocking WHERE reason LIKE '%damage%' ORDER BY overstock_id DESC;

SELECT analysis_id, TA.trend_id, TP.description FROM inventory_analysis AS IA INNER JOIN trends_and_patterns AS TP ON IA.pattern_id = TP.pattern_id INNER JOIN trends_and_patterns AS TA ON IA.trend_id = TA.trend_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory_data;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory_data;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, transaction_date FROM inventory_data ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT pattern_name, type FROM patterns WHERE type = 'Regular';
SELECT id, trend_name FROM trends ORDER BY trend_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_data WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM inventory_data WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY quantity ASC;

SELECT patterns.id, patterns.pattern_name, overstocking.overstocked_quantity FROM patterns INNER JOIN overstocking ON patterns.id = overstocking.product_id WHERE overstocking.overstocked_quantity > 50;
SELECT trends.trend_name, trends.description, inventory_data.product_name FROM trends LEFT JOIN inventory_data ON trends.id = inventory_data.id WHERE trends.id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, transaction_date FROM inventory_data WHERE product_name LIKE '%phone%' OR product_name LIKE '%tablet%' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;
